ygData.subject: RE: Another question about the new armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: aye hero bracer is quite nice.  i bought one for our in-game husband as a wedding gift (my gift was a second ykesha woohoo!) and it cost me 3000pp. did not
ygData.messageBody:
aye hero bracer is quite nice. i bought one for our in-game husband as a
wedding gift (my gift was a second ykesha woohoo!) and it cost me 3000pp.
did not want to spend a week or two building faction, AND thank god because
not only can a wood elf as myself not wear it (i tried to hehe) but i heard
we can not complete the quest either.

Shada

> From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
> The Hero Bracer is far better than the Lambent bracer in my
> opinion, that is
> if you are of the size race who can wear it, but it is lore
> so I see myself
> wearing a combination of 1 hero bracer and 1 lambent for a
> combined total AC
> and bonuses of AC18 STR+14 CHA+1 DIS+10 POI+10 WT6.5 just for
> 2 bracers!
>
> Just something else to consider if any of you half-elf or
> hummie bards have
> not thought of it yet.
>
> -Faras
